name: DACA Renewal Application
description: Form to help prepare a Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) renewal application

sections.title: 1. Personal Information
2. Contact Information
3. DACA Status Information
sections.content:
Date of Initial DACA Approval: {initial_daca_approval_date}
Current DACA Expiration Date: {daca_expiration_date}

sections.title: 4. Education and Employment
5. Residence History
sections.content: Previous Addresses Since Last DACA Application (include dates): {previous_addresses}

sections.title: 6. Travel History
sections.content: Travel Outside the United States Since Last DACA Application (include dates, destinations, and purposes): {travel_history}

sections.title: 7. Criminal History
sections.content: Any Citations, Arrests, or Criminal Charges Since Last DACA Application: {criminal_history}

sections.title: 8. Legal Representation
sections.content: Attorney or Accredited Representative Information (if applicable): {attorney_information}

sections.title: 9. Additional Information
sections.content: Any Other Relevant Information for Your DACA Renewal Application: {additional_information}

sections.title: 10. Certification
